original_title: Kiss: Live at the Houston Summit
overview: On August 13, 1976 a white-hot KISS came to Houston concert venue The Summit for just their third show in the area.  The band at this point was blowing up after releasing the hit LP “Destroyer” and brought a pyrotechnic-heavy rock show with them to thrill fans. Opening with “Detroit Rock City” and closing with “Black Diamond.”
title: Kiss: Live at the Houston Summit
